attributes.name: [AWS CloudTrail OTEL] Excessive high-risk actions succeed

esqlQuery.esql:
// Alert triggers when any high risk actions succeded within a given threshold time from a single user or IP
FROM logs-aws.cloudtrail.otel-default | WHERE @timestamp > NOW()- 10m | WHERE rpc.method IN ("StopLogging", "DeleteTrail","AttachUserPolicy", "AttachRolePolicy","CreateAccessKey", "CreateUser","AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress","DisableKey", "ScheduleKeyDeletion")| STATS change_count = COUNT(*),changes = VALUES(rpc.method) BY user.name, source.address
